metadata.title: CVE-2015-8604 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the host_new_graphs function ingraphs_new.php in Cacti 0.8.8f and earlier allows remote authenticatedusers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the cg_g parameter in a saveaction.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.1').
